name: Ball Lightning
ability: Skill attacks have a chance of inflicting Paralysis

additional_data.description: The spirit of floating balls of electricity. Ball Lightning can effortlessly command multiple orbs, each of which pack a punch as powerful as a bolt of lightning. If she's in the room when a fight breaks out, you can say goodbye to all your electronics. No doubt thanks to her elemental affiliation, Ball Lightning gets on with lightning beasts like a house on fire, so much so that when two or more of them get together in the Bureau of the Occult, you'll often hear lightning strike as they entertain each other. If ever you hear thunder in the corridors, keep away at all costs.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 02/08/17 - 09/08/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 02/08/17 - 09/08/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 09/08/17
◦ Can only be exchanged once

main: "Watch it, touch me and you're in for a shock!"
